name: SwingItRight
description:
A game that show very little of mood swings and how the person finds it difficult to push through the day and fight the challenging enemy within themselves to proceed and progress by knowing the different types of modes and the right way to handle them 

The controls of the game will change base on the mood

Currently two moods, more moods to come with more variations in each

This game was developed in collaboration with the awesome @Caro

https://carormkh.itch.io/

I hope you enjoy the game
